name: bot-status
description: Pushes an embed to display in the channel about a bot update.
example: !bot-status Fixed a bug in the help command

name: createcommands
description: Allows Erin to create the Slash Commands.

name: deletecommands
description: Allows Erin to delete the Slash Commands.

name: dm
description: Sends an official embed to a user.

name: server-status
description: Pushes an embed to display in the channel about a server update.

name: site-status
description: Pushes an embed to display in the channel about a website update.

name: access
description: Gives users access to the server by assigning roles.

name: access2
description: Alternative access command for server role assignment.

name: boosters
description: Manages server booster perks and information.

name: clear-suggs
description: Clears suggestions from the database.

name: reactionrole
description: Sets up reaction roles for the server.

name: server-rules
description: Displays or manages server rules.

name: welcome
description: Manages welcome messages for new members.

name: 8ball
description: Ask the magic 8-ball a question!

name: choose
description: Can't decide? Let me choose for you!

name: compliment
description: Gives you a nice compliment!

name: dice
description: Roll a dice with specified number of sides.

name: fact
description: Get a random interesting fact!

name: flip
description: Flip a coin!

name: joke
description: Get a random joke!

name: meme
description: Get a random meme!

name: quote
description: Get an inspirational quote!

name: riddle
description: Get a riddle to solve!

name: roast
description: Get a playful roast!

name: rps
description: Play rock, paper, scissors!

name: spongebob
description: Convert text to SpongeBob mocking case!

name: trivia
description: Get a trivia question!

name: bin
description: Tells people a few places they could go to share long pieces of code.

name: career
description: Allows users to get information on how to get careers in the IT field.

name: djs
description: Sends an invite link to the Discord.js Discord Server

name: ddev
description: Sends a link to join the Discord Developers Discord Server

name: djslangfirst
description: Asks users to learn JavaScript before trying to learn Discord.js

name: dom-listening
description: Sends information about why not to use dom listening attributes/properties.

name: dpy
description: Sends an invite link to the Discord.py Discord Server.

name: editors
description: Sends information on commonly used IDEs or Text Editors.

name: elaborate
description: Asks people to elaborate by including code or by including more information.

name: error
description: Tells people to post the full stack trace.

name: faq
description: Tells users to check out our FAQ channel and docs to get their simple questions answered.

name: format
description: Asks people to format their code with backticks or by sharing their code on places like pastebin.com

name: freelance
description: Allows users to get information on how to self employment or freelancing.

name: gettinganswers
description: Sends information on how to ask better questions.

name: hire
description: Refers people to the request-coders channel to hire someone.

name: just-ask
description: Reminds users to just ask their question instead of asking if they can ask.

name: largehosting
description: Sends information about hosting providers.

name: lines
description: Asks users to provide specific line numbers when asking for help.

name: nojquery
description: Sends information on why JQuery isn't used and is bad to use.

name: noscreens
description: Sends information on why it is best to avoid sending screenshots of your code.

name: patience
description: Reminds users to be patient when waiting for help.

name: poor-phrase
description: Helps users rephrase poorly worded questions.

name: react
description: Sends an invite link to the Reactiflux Discord Server

name: rules
description: Asks users to make sure they are following the rules.
usage: /rules @username or user ID rule number[1-5] or /rules @username or ID all

name: share-code
description: Reminds users to share their code when asking for help.

name: smallhosting
description: This is a small snippet from our `/largehosting` command.

name: try
description: Encourages users to try solving the problem themselves first.

name: vla
description: Sends info on what a VLA is and why is it bad?

name: w3schools
description: Informs our users why they should avoid w3schools like the plague.

name: wrong-channel
description: Redirects users to the appropriate channel for their question.

name: thanks-leaderboard
description: Shows the thanks leaderboard.

name: thanks
description: Allows our users to thank other members for their help.

name: unthanks
description: Remove thanks from a user.

name: completed-sugg
description: Mark a suggestion as completed.

name: denied-sugg
description: Mark a suggestion as denied.

name: edit-sugg
description: Edit a suggestion.

name: prog-sugg
description: Mark a suggestion as in progress.

name: status-sugg
description: Check the status of a suggestion.

name: suggestions
description: Creates a suggestion!

name: about-dev
description: Information about the bot developer.

name: about
description: Information about the bot.

name: avatar
description: Get a user's avatar.

name: help
description: This allows users to find out more information on all of our commands.

name: invite
description: Get an invite link for the bot.

name: ping
description: Check the bot's latency.

name: server-info
description: Get information about the current server.

name: user-info
description: Get information about a user.
